licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) Licence applies to this document.

This licence applies to this TEI-XML document which is the transformed result work from a previous LaTEX format file out of the variorum diplomatic edition of the complete poemes of Ausiàs March in all its witnesses.
The licence was added on May 1, 2020.

msIdentifier.repository: Biblioteca Virtual Lluís Vives - Cervantes Virtual

msItem.rubric: f.74 After end of previous poem, before this one§Mossen Ausias march§

editorialDecl.p: This a TEI-XML adaptation out of the LaTEX version of Ausiàs March's poems' variorum edition, from all witnesses.

lg.l: ¶ Si be mostrau que mj no auorriu
Ans vos altau de ma simpla paraula
E mos escrits no creheu esser faula
Heꝯ Heus plau demj si algunhom ben diu
Quant ymagjn que pervos yo amar
Auoresch mj que res noy fall dentregue
En aquell punt tot mon bon voler negue
Puys que vostralt no pasan be amar
Conort bastant enmj no pusch pensar
E si pertemps alguna part ne tench
Sera perco com part damor tal prench
Quel sabra mal sil he desemparar
Aure amor demj desposseit
Que per null temps tal seruent cobrara
Aquest pensar conort me portara
Durara tant com seren fellonit
Co que deman merex preu jnfinit
Nol vull hauer abres nomerexent
Lanimaꝯ Lanimaus do ques adeu bell present
Ella nol plau auer lo cors jaquit
Noꝯ Nous prech damor mas que lam demostreu
Del ques enuos aure singular grat
Si bon voler me teniu amagat
Tant ham lomal ab quel me amagueu
Yo so ben cert que vos mj conexeu
E los tres temps demj noignorau
Mos pensaments yo crech que sapiau
Nous preheu donchs sinom regonexeu
Lo meu voler abjnfinit sacosta
Sera content del vostre poch homolt
Donchs enuers mj noꝯ nous cal anar destolt
LamjsPer camins. pla sens baranch nj gran costa
Vostra valor tot quant puch dar macosta
Nom resta pꝯ pus quel viure doloros
Dos grans contrasts de voler veig envos
Mon viures plau de mort es laresposta
Los hulls tinch cluchs no conech nit ne jorn
No tinch hom prop quj del temps me auise
No sent res ferm ab que lo temps diuise
Ab tot aco mapensa no pren born
Lir entre carts dins enmj port vn forn
Cohent unpa duna dolca sapbor
Yaquell matex sent degran amargor
Tot acompren deu hores enlo jorn
